title: HOUR 2 - Eric Mangini, Baltimore Ravens, Tom Brady
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Eric Mangini, Baltimore Ravens, Tom Brady
description:
In hour 2, 3-time Super Bowl champion Eric Mangini joins the show to tell Nick what he thought of Jones' performance and how Brady handled his return to New England. Nick Wright also gives his thoughts on the Baltimore Ravens showing up the Denver Broncos by not kneeling and going for the 43rd straight 100yd rushing game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
